org.agilej.sparkle

Interface WebRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWebRequest

    public interface WebRequest
    interface for presenting a web request

    • Field Summary

        default String getSessionId()
        session's id
        Returns:
        session id

      • locale

        default Locale locale()
        resolve current request's locale by using LocaleResolver. The default is AcceptHeaderLocaleResolver
        Note if you directly use Servlet API to get locale you may be get different result if the LocaleResolver is not configured to AcceptHeaderLocaleResolver.
        Returns:
